entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 09:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -30.6°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
